title: Scoreless Society
story_summary: In the tightly controlled city of Stenograd, where citizens' lives are managed by the ever-present Behavioral Compliance Index, order seems unbreakable until its architect, Marek Halden, is found dead under mysterious circumstances. As the system falters, Lenart Kova and Oksana Lintz uncover Halden's hidden diagrams and code, risking everything to trigger a secret rollback that abruptly shifts privileges and brings erased 'ghost' citizens back into the light. These ghosts, once vanished by the system, seize their chance - demanding recognition and justice in exchange for helping to stabilize the crumbling city. Their return sparks bitter debates, exposes past abuses, and fractures the ruling Council, even as protests boil over. As Lintz and Kova call for a temporary score amnesty, citizens cautiously reclaim their voices, only to discover an unfixable flaw deep within the BCI. Guided by Halden's final clues, they disable scoring altogether, forcing Stenograd to rebuild itself beyond the shadows of algorithmic control.

official.headline: Scoreless Society Dawns
official.anchor_line: Stenograd residents awaken to a fully scoreless city, as behavioral rankings are retired from daily life.
official.contextual_reframing: Efficient leadership delivers a seamless shift to new routines, demonstrating our city's exceptional resilience and adaptability.

official.headline: Citizens Self-Organize
official.anchor_line: Without automated rankings, citizens find new ways to access work, housing, and services across the city.
official.contextual_reframing: Spontaneous order and community-driven solutions highlight the population's strength and unity in change.

official.headline: Halden's Final Legacy
official.anchor_line: Investigations reveal that Halden's last actions prepared the city for this transition, exposing the limits of automation.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council reaffirms commitment to transparency and collective progress as Stenograd enters a new era of governance.

underground.headline: Scores Offline Overnight
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd's precious BCI is gone - no warning, no say, just silence on the screens.
underground.contextual_reframing: They called it a technical upgrade, but word on the street? It was panic. When the system falls apart, so does their control - until we step in.

underground.headline: Order Or Just Waiting
underground.anchor_line: With no rankings to follow, crowds fumble for work, homes and food - order, or just confusion now?
underground.contextual_reframing: We build what they broke. Neighborhoods run on trust, not numbers. Power's scrambling, but people find a way. That's real resilience.

underground.headline: Halden's Dead Man Switch
underground.anchor_line: Halden's fatal system flaw finally outed - he set it up to fail, and the Council tried to bury the truth.
underground.contextual_reframing: Turns out control isn't perfect. His warnings forced their hand. We saw the cracks in time - now everyone does.
